channel.title: CVE Feed for Automattic -- Newspack Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automattic -- Newspack Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-37424|2024-07-10T16:30:09.164Z -- automattic -- newspack%20blocks
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Automattic Newspack Blocks allows Upload a Web Shell to a Web Server.This issue affects Newspack Blocks: from n/a through 3.0.8.
